DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to investigate and collect post marketing data on the safety and efficacy of Visanne at follow-up visit after about 6 months of treatment and - for a subset of patients - at optional long-term follow-up visit after about 1 year of treatment under daily practice treatment conditions in Korean women and to obtain data on drug utilization on treatment for endometriosis.
DOC.brief_title: Regulatory Post Marketing Surveillance Study in Korea
DOC.criteria: Signed and dated informed consent Women diagnosed by a physician as having endometriosis Women who are prescribed Visanne(dienogest 2mg)for the first time during the study period All contraindications according to the local marketing authorization have to be considered.
